title: MD
biography: Lotte Bjerre Knudsen is a Danish scientist and university professor. She led the development of liraglutide and oversaw the development of semaglutide, two notable drugs approved for indications in the treatment of diabetes and obesity.
aiSummary: Lotte B. Knudsen is a glp-1 drug development specialist with an H-index of 138 at Novo Nordisk (Faculty). Has been published in Nature, Nature medicine, Science translational medicine. Based in Denmark.
